author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: Aguata Union adopts Ezeemo’s candidacy
text:
Home » News » Aguata Union adopts Ezeemo’s candidacy Aguata Union adopts Ezeemo’s candidacy On 
THE Old Aguata Union (OAU) in Anambra State has adopted Mr. Godwin Chukwunenye Godwin Ezeemo 
, as the governorship aspirant under the Progressive Peoples Alliance PPA in the forth coming governorship Anambra election. 
Responding , Ezeemo stressed that every zone in Anambra state has had its turn in the governance of the state and so “Government House at Agu Awka must come from Aguata. Right now the people of Old Aguata Union have made a choice. There are a couple of us in the race from Old Aguata and if they decided that it is me, who am I to say no to the clarion call. I have voluntarily give myself willingly to serve the people in the best way nobody has ever served the state. I will do the very best and make sure that we regenerate the state to take its place in the committee of state as the light of the nation”, he concluded. Nwafor Polycarp
